sentences.en: A median filter for removing noise in black and white scans.
sentences.cn: 中值滤波去除噪声的黑白扫描.

sentences.en: An improved median filtering algorithm is presented in this paper.
sentences.cn: 摘要提出了一种改进的中值滤波算法.

sentences.en: And the iterative median filtering algorithm is used when smoothing impulse noise.
sentences.cn: 而在滤除噪声时,采用的是迭代的中值滤波算法.

sentences.en: Article basis afore - mentioned viewpoints, analysed the affirmatory method median.
sentences.cn: 文章依据上述观点, 分析了中位数的确定方法.

sentences.en: Because the involvement price is high, suggestion median line operation.
sentences.cn: 由于介入价位较高, 建议中线操作.

sentences.en: HBIG was discontinued a median of 26 ( range, 0.2 - 121 ) months after OLT.
sentences.cn: 在原位肝移植术后平均26 ( 范围0.2-121个月 ) 个月HBIG被 停用.

sentences.en: Median oerall surial of all 211 patients was 49.3 months.
sentences.cn: 所有211名患者的中位总存活数是49.3个月.

sentences.en: Middle - class lifestyles have flourished even though median wages have barely budged.
sentences.cn: 尽管收入中值几乎原地不动, 中产阶级 的生活方式还是日益兴旺.

sentences.en: One half of its values will be found below and one half above the median.
sentences.cn: 一半数值低于中位数,一半数值高于中位数.

sentences.en: Ranking is based on 2 AL subjects, the middle median admissions grades.
sentences.cn: 排名以2科高级程度科目作为中位数招生等级.

sentences.en: The average and median durations of unemployment also fell.
sentences.cn: 平均失业期及普遍失业期也减短了.

sentences.en: The median age of the group is 42.
The median interval between onset of symptoms and diagnosis was three months.
sentences.cn: 3例有家族史,且均为姊妹配对.

sentences.en: The paper presents an easily applicable adaptive weighted median filter ( AWMF ).
sentences.cn: 通过介绍一种易于实现的自适应权重中值滤波器 ( AWMF ).

sentences.en: The remaining fingers are supplied by the median nerve.
sentences.cn: 其余的手指是由正中神经支配的.

sentences.en: Where the speed distribution is skew, it's better to quote the median speed.
sentences.cn: 在速度分布是扭曲的情况下, 最好用中值速度.

trans.tran_cn: 中央的，中间的，[数]中值的
trans.tran_en: being the middle number or measurement in a set of numbers or measurements that have been arranged in order
the middle number or measurement in a set of numbers or measurements that have been arranged in order
